children.name: Get an overview of your Acquire-to-Onboard (ATO) Process

blocks.text: This Dashboard provides a high-level overview of an Acquire-to-Onboard (ATO) process. It highlights key KPIs as well as a high-level analysis of the process to identify areas to investigate further.
Page 1 - Discovery: A process model from your event log data, displays the most common process paths.
Page 2 - Overview: Key KPIs and metrics that describe the current process state from a particular use case perspective.
Page 3 - Analysis: High-level analysis of key use cases and changes over time.
Please see our Dashboard Documentation for more information on how to manage your dashboards.
Kindly provide feedback on the Dashboard, this will aid us in enhancing its functionality.

children.name: User Guide - Process Conformance checker widget
children.description: Choose this widget to (a) display various activities (b) map the process against BPMN process model

blocks.text: The aim of Variant Explorer Widget is to discover the various process paths. You can display several variants at a time.
Before you start, make sure that a BPMN model is created via "Generate BPMN" (top right corner) or linked. Read more on how to link a BPMN process in section Create an investigation.
For further information, check Signavio Documentation here.

children.name: Number of Purchase Orders
children.description: Number of all Purchase Orders covered in the data set

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT(DISTINCT "PO Id") AS "Number of POs"
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS

children.name: On-Time Delivery Rate of Assets
children.description: Count of PO Items with "Delivery Completed" Flag and last "GR Creation Date" before the "Requested Delivery Date"

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  (
    1 - COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
      WHERE
        DATE_TRUNC('day', "Last GR Creation Date") 
        > "PO Item Last Requested Delivery Date"
        AND "PO Item Delivery Completed" = 'Yes'
    ) / COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
      WHERE
        "PO Item Delivery Completed" = 'Yes'
    )
  ) * 100
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Number of Asset Items
children.description: Number of all Asset Items covered in the data set

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE
      event_name = 'Create Asset Item'
  )
FROM
  FLATTEN (THIS_PROCESS)

children.name: Average Cycle Time from Invoice to Asset
children.description: Average cycle time from Invoice creation to asset creation

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  AVG (
    (
      SELECT
        LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
          WHERE
            EVENT_NAME IN ('Create FI Invoice')
        )
    ) - (
      SELECT
        FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
          WHERE
            EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Asset Item')
        )
    )
  )
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS
WHERE
  EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Create Asset Item' ~> 'Create FI Invoice')

children.name: Change Rate
children.description: Percentage of cases with changes like 'Update Price' or 'Change Payment Terms'

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    WHERE
      (
        SELECT
          BOOL_OR (
            EVENT_NAME ILIKE '%Update%'
            OR EVENT_NAME ILIKE '%Change%'
          )
      )
  ) / COUNT (CASE_ID) * 10
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Maverick Buying Rate
children.description: Percentage of cases where PO Item is created after Invoice is created

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    WHERE
      EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Create FI Invoice' ~> 'Create PO Item')
  ) / COUNT (CASE_ID) * 100
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Total Value of Purchase Orders
children.description: Total Purchase Order Net Amount in USD

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  SUM("PO Item Net Order Value in USD")
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS

blocks.text: Below, you can check the KPIs that describe the current Process state from a particular Use Case perspective.

children.name: Average Cycle Time from PO to Asset
children.description: Average cycle time from Purchase Order creation to Asset creation

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  AVG (
    (
      SELECT
        LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
          WHERE
            EVENT_NAME LIKE 'Create Asset Item'
        )
    ) - (
      SELECT
        FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
          WHERE
            EVENT_NAME IN ('Create PO Item')
        )
    )
  )
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS
WHERE
  EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Create PO Item' ~> 'Create Asset Item')

children.name: AVG Automation Rate Overall
children.description: Percentage of automated events. Events with an undefined User Type are excluded from the scope

children.name: Automation Rate of Asset Events
children.description: Automation rate of Purchase Requisition (PR) events like 'Create Asset', 'Post Asset'

children.name: Number of Purchase Requisitions
children.description: Number of all Purchase Requisitions covered in the data set

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT(DISTINCT "First PR Id") AS "Number of PRs"
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Overall Asset Value Capitalized
children.description: Overall Asset Value Capitalized covered in the data set

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  SUM("Asset Value in USD") AS "Total Asset Value"
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Number of Invoices
children.description: Number of all Invoices covered in the data set

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT(DISTINCT APUniqueKey) AS "# of Invoices"
FROM
  FLATTEN (THIS_PROCESS)
WHERE
  event_name = 'Create FI Invoice'

children.name: Conformance Rate
children.description: Percentage of cases which follow the pre-defined order of ATO events

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    WHERE
      EVENT_NAME MATCHES (
        'Create PR Item' -> 'Create PO Item' -> 'Create Goods Receipt' -> 
        'Create Asset Item' -> 'Post Asset Item' -> 'Capitalize Asset Item' -> 
        'Create FI Invoice'
      )
  ) / COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    WHERE
      EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Create FI Invoice')
  ) * 100
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Total PO Item Quantity
children.description: Total PO Item quantity

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	SUM("PO Item Quantity" ) AS "Total PO Item Quantity"
FROM 
  THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Change Rate
children.description: Percentage of cases with events like 'Update Price' or 'Change Payment Terms'

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    WHERE
      (
        SELECT
          BOOL_OR (
            EVENT_NAME ILIKE '%Update%'
            OR EVENT_NAME ILIKE '%Change%'
          )
      )
  ) / COUNT (CASE_ID) * 100
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Conformance Level over Time
children.description: Percentage of cases which follow the pre-defined order of ATO events

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC(
    'month',
    (
      SELECT
        FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
          WHERE
            EVENT_NAME IN ('Create PO Item')
        )
    )
  ) AS "PO Creation Date",
  COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    WHERE
      EVENT_NAME MATCHES (
        'Create PR Item' -> 'Create PO Item' -> 'Create Goods Receipt' -> 
        'Create Asset Item' -> 'Post Asset Item' -> 'Capitalize Asset Item' -> 
        'Create FI Invoice'      
        )
  ) / COUNT (CASE_ID) * 100 AS "Conformance Rate"
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS
WHERE
  EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Create FI Invoice')
ORDER BY
  1 ASC NULLS FIRST FILL TIMESERIES('MONTH'),
  NULL

children.name: Automation Rate Overall over Time
children.description: Percentage of automated events over time

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC('month', end_time) AS "Event Date",
  COUNT ("event_name") FILTER (
    WHERE
      BEHAVIOUR (
        "Event Created By User Type" IN ('System', 'Service')
      ) AS automation MATCHES (automation)
  ) / COUNT ("event_name") FILTER (
    WHERE
      BEHAVIOUR (
        "Event Created By User Type" IS NOT NULL
      ) AS all_cases MATCHES (all_cases)
  ) * 100 AS "Automation Rate"
FROM
  FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
ORDER BY
  1 ASC NULLS FIRST FILL TIMESERIES('month'),
  NULL

children.name: Change Rate over Time
children.description: Percentage of cases with events like 'Update Price' or 'Change Payment Terms' over time

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC(
    'month',
    (
      SELECT
        FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
          WHERE
            event_name IN ('Create PO Item')
        )
    )
  ) AS "PO Creation Date",
  COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    WHERE
      (
        SELECT
          BOOL_OR (
            EVENT_NAME ILIKE '%Update%'
            OR EVENT_NAME ILIKE '%Change%'
          )
      )
  ) / COUNT (CASE_ID) * 100 AS "Change Rate"
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS
ORDER BY
  1 ASC NULLS FIRST FILL TIMESERIES('MONTH'),
  NULL

blocks.text: This page shows how the main KPIs are changing over time.
Hint: Use case specific analysis provided in respective Dashboards.

children.name: AVG Automation Rate Overall
children.description: Percentage of automated events. Events with an undefined User Type are excluded from the scope

children.name: Number of Purchase Requisition
children.description: Number of all Purchase Requisition covered in the data set

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT(DISTINCT "First PR Id") AS "Number of PRs"
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Number of Purchase Orders
children.description: Number of all Purchase Orders covered in the data set

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT(DISTINCT "PO Id") AS "Number of POs"
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS

dataSource.query:
SELECT
 COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE
      event_name = 'Create Asset Item'
  )
FROM
  FLATTEN (THIS_PROCESS)

children.name: Conformance Rate
children.description: Percentage of cases which follow the pre-defined order of ATO events

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    WHERE
      EVENT_NAME MATCHES (
        'Create PR Item' -> 'Create PO Item' -> 'Create Goods Receipt' -> 
        'Create Asset Item' -> 'Post Asset Item' -> 'Capitalize Asset Item' -> 
        'Create FI Invoice'      
        )
  ) / COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    WHERE
      EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Create FI Invoice')
  ) * 100
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS

children.name: PR creation & Cycle time over Time
children.description: Distribution overview of created Purchase Requisitions and average cycle time

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC(
    'MONTH',
    (
      SELECT
        FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
          WHERE
            EVENT_NAME IN ('Create PR Item')
        )
    )
  ) AS "PR Creation Date",
  COUNT(DISTINCT "First PR Id") AS "Number of Purchase Requisitions",
  AVG(
    (
      SELECT
        LAST ("end_time") 
         - FIRST ("end_time") 
  )) AS "Avg. Cycle time"
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS
ORDER BY
  1 ASC NULLS FIRST FILL TIMESERIES('MONTH')

children.name: PO creation & Cycle time over Time
children.description: Distribution overview of Purchase Order creation and average process cycle time

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC(
    'MONTH',
    (
      SELECT
        FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
          WHERE
            EVENT_NAME IN ('Create PO Item')
        )
    )
  ) AS "PO Creation Date",
  COUNT(DISTINCT "PO Id") AS "Number of Purchase Orders",
  AVG(
    (
      SELECT
        LAST ("end_time") 
         - FIRST ("end_time") 
  )) AS "Avg. Cycle time"
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS
ORDER BY
  1 ASC NULLS FIRST FILL TIMESERIES('MONTH')

children.name: Asset Item creation & Cycle time over Time
children.description: Distribution overview of Asset Item creation and average process cycle time

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC(
    'MONTH',
    (
      SELECT
        FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
          WHERE
            EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Asset Item')
        )
    )
  ) AS "Asset Creation Date",
  COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (WHERE (SELECT BOOL_OR(event_name IN ('Create Asset Item')))) AS "Number of Asset Items",
  AVG(
    (
      SELECT
        LAST ("end_time") 
         - FIRST ("end_time") 
  )) AS "Avg. Cycle time"
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS
ORDER BY
  1 ASC NULLS FIRST FILL TIMESERIES('MONTH')
